instruction: How do I create and manage email templates?
input: I need to create an email template
output:
To create and manage email templates: **Creating a Template:** 1. **Navigate to** `/admin/templates` 2. **Click 'Create New Template'** 3. **Fill in template details:** - Template Name: Descriptive name - Subject: Email subject line - HTML Body: Rich HTML content - Text Body: Plain text version - Meta: Additional configuration 4. **Save the template** **API Method:** ``` POST /api/admin/campaign/templates { "name": "Template Name", "subject": "Email Subject", "htmlBody": "

Hello {{name}}

Content here

", "textBody": "Hello {{name}}\n\nContent here", "meta": { "isActive": true, "audienceGroup": "general" } } ``` **Template Variables:** - `{{name}}` - Recipient's name - `{{email}}` - Recipient's email - `{{firstName}}` - First name - `{{lastName}}` - Last name - `{{unsubscribeUrl}}` - Unsubscribe link **Managing Templates:** - **Edit:** PUT /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id] - **Delete:** DELETE /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id] - **List:** GET /api/admin/campaign/templates - **Get Details:** GET /api/admin/campaign/templates/[id]
